textapaixonado: Passionate about technology and making things happen.
textrolebaixo: Scroll down to see more about me.
textaboutdesc: Learn more about my journey and what drives me in the field of technology.
trajetoria1: I hold a degree in Systems Analysis and Development and am currently pursuing a postgraduate degree in Computer Engineering. I have been dedicating myself to web development, focusing on HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, always seeking to improve my technical and creative skills.
trajetoria2: My experience in customer service has helped me develop clear communication and effective problem-solving skills — qualities I apply daily in technology projects. I also study advanced English to broaden my horizons and collaborate with international teams.
textprojdesc1: Projects that reflect my growth as a developer.
proj-desc-1: An institutional website for a real company in the automotive sector, serving over 150 clients per month. Strengthening the company's online presence and increasing its digital visibility.
proj-desc-2: Interactive mini-game developed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The player controls the character and must jump over obstacles while the background moves dynamically.
proj-desc-3: Project under construction at the moment. Updates will be coming soon!
contatosub1: I'm always open to new opportunities and collaborations.
contatosub2: If you'd like to talk about technology, projects, or partnerships, send a message below!
